models.name: shopping_platform_channels
models.description: Shopping platform channels representing different marketplace segments or regions that merchants can operate in. These are core business entities that organize the platform structure and allow targeted shopping experiences.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unique code identifier for the channel, used for URL routing and categorization.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Human-readable name of the channel displayed to users.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Detailed description explaining the channel's purpose and target audience.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the channel was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of the last update to the channel.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp for channel deactivation.

models.name: shopping_platform_sections
models.description: Sections within shopping channels that organize products into logical groupings, supporting the channel's hierarchical structure.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unique code within the channel for URL routing and organization.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Human-readable name of the section displayed to users.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Explanation of what products or services belong in this section.

plainFields.name: sort_order
plainFields.description: Display order among other sections within the same channel.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the section was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of the last update to the section.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp for section deactivation.

models.name: shopping_platform_channel_categories
models.description: Junction table connecting shopping channels to platform categories, enabling multi-category association for flexible catalog organization.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the channel-category association was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of the last update to this association.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp for association deactivation.

models.name: shopping_platform_buyers
models.description: Buyer account information for customers who shop and place orders. Represents the buyer's identity and connection basis for all shopping activities including authentication, personal details, and account status management.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Buyer's email address used for authentication and notifications. Must be unique per buyer account.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Hashed password for buyer authentication. Never stores plain passwords.

plainFields.name: first_name
plainFields.description: Buyer's first name for personalization and shipping labels.

plainFields.name: last_name
plainFields.description: Buyer's last name for personalization and shipping labels.

plainFields.name: phone
plainFields.description: Buyer's contact phone number for order communications and support.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Buyer's account status indicating active, suspended, or inactive state for workflow management.

plainFields.name: loyalty_points
plainFields.description: Accumulated loyalty points for rewards and special offers, defaulting to zero.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when buyer account was created for audit trails.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of last buyer account modification.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp for buyers, allowing recovery and preserving referential integrity.

models.name: shopping_platform_sellers
models.description: Seller account information for merchants listing products and managing sales. Represents verified business entities managing their catalogs, inventory, and fulfillment operations.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Seller's email address used for authentication, order notifications, and business communications.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Hashed password for seller authentication. Never stores plain passwords.

plainFields.name: company_name
plainFields.description: Legal business name of the seller entity for compliance and tax purposes.

plainFields.name: tax_id
plainFields.description: Business tax identification number for regulatory compliance and payouts.

plainFields.name: phone
plainFields.description: Seller's business contact phone for support and verification purposes.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Seller's business status indicating active, pending verification, suspended, or inactive state.

plainFields.name: commission_rate
plainFields.description: Percentage commission rate applied to seller's transactions, ranging from 0 to 100.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when seller account was created for business registration tracking.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of last seller account or business detail modification.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp for sellers, preserving transaction history and allowing business reactivation.

models.name: shopping_platform_admins
models.description: Admin account information for system administrators managing platform operations, user accounts, content moderation, and system-wide oversight.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Admin's email address used for authentication and secure system access.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Hashed password for admin authentication. Never stores plain passwords.

plainFields.name: username
plainFields.description: Admin username for login purposes, unique within admin accounts.

plainFields.name: full_name
plainFields.description: Admin's full legal name for audit logging and access verification.

plainFields.name: department
plainFields.description: Administrative department or role designation for access control and oversight.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Admin account status indicating active, locked, or disabled state.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when admin account was created for system security tracking.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of last admin account modification or security event.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp for admins, maintaining security logs and allowing account reactivation.

models.name: shopping_platform_addresses
models.description: Address information associated with buyers, sellers, or admins. Each address belongs to exactly one actor through the foreign key references, supporting multiple addresses per user for shipping, billing, and business purposes.

plainFields.name: nickname
plainFields.description: Descriptive name for this address (e.g., 'Home', 'Office', 'Warehouse') to help users identify multiple addresses.

plainFields.name: street_1
plainFields.description: Primary street address line including building number and street name.

plainFields.name: street_2
plainFields.description: Secondary address line for apartment/unit numbers or additional address details.

plainFields.name: city
plainFields.description: City or municipality name for the address location.

plainFields.name: state
plainFields.description: State, province, or region name for administrative subdivision.

plainFields.name: postal_code
plainFields.description: Postal or ZIP code for mail delivery routing and verification.

plainFields.name: country
plainFields.description: Country name or code for international address formatting and shipping.

plainFields.name: is_default
plainFields.description: Indicates whether this address is the default selection for the owner actor.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this address was created for historical tracking.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of last address detail modification.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp for addresses, allowing recovery without affecting active orders.

models.name: shopping_platform_sales
models.description: Product information, the core sales entity representing items available for purchase. {@link shopping_platform_sale_units} Contains basic product details like name, description, and pricing, with relationships to sellers, categories, and shipping addresses.

foreignFields.name: shopping_platform_address_id
foreignFields.description: Return address for this product's {@link shopping_platform_addresses.id}

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unique business identifier for the product.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Display name of the product.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Detailed description of the product.

plainFields.name: base_price
plainFields.description: Base selling price in USD.

plainFields.name: is_active
plainFields.description: Whether the product is currently available for purchase.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the record was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the record was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp, null if not deleted.

models.name: shopping_platform_sale_snapshots
models.description: Historical snapshots of sales data for audit trails and change tracking. {@link shopping_platform_sales} Captures point-in-time states of product listings with denormalized data for historical accuracy.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Snapshot of the product code.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Snapshot of the product name.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Snapshot of the product description.

plainFields.name: base_price
plainFields.description: Snapshot of the base price.

plainFields.name: is_active
plainFields.description: Snapshot of active status.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when snapshot was created.

models.name: shopping_platform_sale_units
models.description: Product units or variants, subsidiary to main sales entity for managing different options like sizes or colors. {@link shopping_platform_sales} {@link shopping_platform_sale_unit_options} Represents individual purchasable items within a product.

plainFields.name: sku
plainFields.description: Stock Keeping Unit unique identifier.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Display name for this unit/variant.

plainFields.name: price_modifier
plainFields.description: Price adjustment relative to base price.

plainFields.name: is_available
plainFields.description: Whether this unit is currently available.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the record was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the record was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp, null if not deleted.

models.name: shopping_platform_sale_unit_options
models.description: Options for sale units, subsidiary entity detailing variant choices like color, size, or material. {@link shopping_platform_sale_units} Provides specific attribute values for product customization.

plainFields.name: attribute_name
plainFields.description: Name of the attribute (e.g., 'color', 'size').

plainFields.name: attribute_value
plainFields.description: Value of the attribute (e.g., 'red', 'large').

plainFields.name: display_order
plainFields.description: Order for displaying options.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the record was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the record was last updated.

models.name: shopping_platform_categories
models.description: Product category hierarchy for organizing sales items. {@link shopping_platform_channel_categories} Supports nested categories with parent relationships for efficient browsing.

foreignFields.name: parent_category_id
foreignFields.description: Parent category's {@link shopping_platform_categories.id} for hierarchical structure.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Category display name.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Category description.

plainFields.name: is_active
plainFields.description: Whether the category is active.

plainFields.name: sort_order
plainFields.description: Display order for categories.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the record was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the record was last updated.

models.name: shopping_platform_inventory
models.description: Inventory levels per SKU, subsidiary to sale units for stock management. {@link shopping_platform_sale_units} Tracks available, reserved, and sold quantities with thresholds for automated alerts.

plainFields.name: quantity_available
plainFields.description: Current available stock quantity.

plainFields.name: quantity_reserved
plainFields.description: Quantity reserved in carts/orders.

plainFields.name: quantity_sold
plainFields.description: Total quantity sold.

plainFields.name: low_stock_threshold
plainFields.description: Threshold for low stock alerts.

plainFields.name: is_backordered_allowed
plainFields.description: Whether backorders are allowed.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the record was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the record was last updated.

models.name: shopping_platform_carts
models.description: Shopping carts containing selected items for checkout, managed independently by buyers. {@link shopping_platform_buyers.id} Allows multiple active carts per user with temporal auditing for cart management history.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Custom cart name for organization purposes.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp for auditing cart lifecycle.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last modification timestamp for cart changes.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp for recoverable cart removal.

models.name: shopping_platform_cart_items
models.description: Individual items within shopping carts, tracking quantity and product variants. {@link shopping_platform_carts.id} Provides detailed cart contents with foreign key references for effective inventory validation.

plainFields.name: quantity
plainFields.description: Quantity of this item in the cart.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Addition timestamp for item tracking.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp for quantity changes.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion for item removal from cart.

models.name: shopping_platform_wishlists
models.description: Wishlists for saving desired products without inventory reservation, managed independently by buyers. {@link shopping_platform_buyers.id} Supports multiple wishlists per user for organization and personalization.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Custom wishlist name for categorization.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Optional description for wishlist purpose.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp for wishlist tracking.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last modification timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion for wishlist removal.

models.name: shopping_platform_wishlist_items
models.description: Items saved in user wishlists, linking buyers to desired product variants. {@link shopping_platform_wishlists.id} Enables wishful purchasing tracking without purchase commitment.

plainFields.name: quantity
plainFields.description: Desired quantity for future purchase.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Addition timestamp to wishlist.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp for changes.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion for item removal from wishlist.

models.name: shopping_platform_orders
models.description: Complete order records representing purchase transactions between buyers and sellers. Tracks order lifecycle from placement through completion, including financial totals, status progression, and relationships to buyers, sellers, and delivery addresses. Central to the e-commerce fulfillment workflow with comprehensive audit capabilities.

foreignFields.name: shopping_platform_buyer_id
foreignFields.description: Buyer's {@link shopping_platform_buyers.id} who placed the order.

foreignFields.name: billing_shopping_platform_address_id
foreignFields.description: Billing address's {@link shopping_platform_addresses.id} for the order.

foreignFields.name: shopping_platform_cart_id
foreignFields.description: Original cart's {@link shopping_platform_carts.id} that generated this order.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unique order identifier for customer reference and tracking.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current order status indicating progress through fulfillment phases.

plainFields.name: business_status
plainFields.description: Business workflow state for operational tracking and reporting.

plainFields.name: subtotal
plainFields.description: Order subtotal before taxes and shipping charges.

plainFields.name: tax_amount
plainFields.description: Calculated tax amount based on shipping destination and items.

plainFields.name: shipping_cost
plainFields.description: Shipping charges for the order including carrier and service fees.

plainFields.name: total
plainFields.description: Final order total including all items, taxes, and shipping.

plainFields.name: discount_amount
plainFields.description: Applied discount amount from coupons or promotions.

plainFields.name: notes
plainFields.description: Additional customer notes or special handling instructions.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Order creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Order last modification timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp for canceled orders.

models.name: shopping_platform_order_snapshots
models.description: Historical snapshots of order states for comprehensive audit trails and change tracking. Captures point-in-time representations of orders enabling rollback capabilities and historical reporting. Supports regulatory compliance with complete order modification history.

foreignFields.name: shopping_platform_order_id
foreignFields.description: Referenced order's {@link shopping_platform_orders.id} for snapshot tracking.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Order code at snapshot time.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Order status at snapshot time.

plainFields.name: business_status
plainFields.description: Business status at snapshot time.

plainFields.name: subtotal
plainFields.description: Subtotal at snapshot time.

plainFields.name: tax_amount
plainFields.description: Tax amount at snapshot time.

plainFields.name: shipping_cost
plainFields.description: Shipping cost at snapshot time.

plainFields.name: total
plainFields.description: Total amount at snapshot time.

plainFields.name: discount_amount
plainFields.description: Discount amount at snapshot time.

plainFields.name: notes
plainFields.description: Notes at snapshot time.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Snapshot creation timestamp.

models.name: shopping_platform_order_items
models.description: Individual line items within orders detailing specific product purchases. Breaks down orders into constituent products with quantities, pricing, and variant specifications. Supports detailed order fulfillment and inventory allocation.

plainFields.name: quantity
plainFields.description: Number of items ordered for this line item.

plainFields.name: unit_price
plainFields.description: Price per item at time of order.

plainFields.name: total_price
plainFields.description: Total price for this line item (quantity Ã— unit_price).

plainFields.name: product_code
plainFields.description: Product code reference for fulfillment.

plainFields.name: variant_details
plainFields.description: Selected product variant specifications (color, size, etc.).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Item creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Item last modification timestamp.

models.name: shopping_platform_payments
models.description: Financial transaction records tracking payment processing for orders. Captures payment methods, amounts, statuses, and processing details enabling secure financial operations and audit trails. Critical for revenue tracking and dispute resolution.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unique payment transaction identifier.

plainFields.name: method
plainFields.description: Payment method used (credit card, digital wallet, etc.).

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Payment processing status and authorization state.

plainFields.name: amount
plainFields.description: Payment amount processed.

plainFields.name: currency
plainFields.description: Payment currency code.

plainFields.name: gateway_transaction_id
plainFields.description: External payment gateway transaction reference.

plainFields.name: failure_reason
plainFields.description: Reason for payment failure if applicable.

plainFields.name: processed_at
plainFields.description: Payment processing completion timestamp.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Payment record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Payment record last modification timestamp.

models.name: shopping_platform_shippings
models.description: Shipping and delivery records for orders. Manages carrier assignments, service levels, and delivery instructions. Supports tracking integration and customer communication about delivery progress.

plainFields.name: carrier
plainFields.description: Shipping carrier provider name.

plainFields.name: service_level
plainFields.description: Service level (standard, express, overnight).

plainFields.name: tracking_number
plainFields.description: Carrier-assigned tracking number.

plainFields.name: estimated_delivery
plainFields.description: Estimated delivery date and time.

plainFields.name: actual_delivery
plainFields.description: Actual delivery completion timestamp.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current shipping status.

plainFields.name: cost
plainFields.description: Shipping cost charged.

plainFields.name: weight
plainFields.description: Package weight for shipping calculation.

plainFields.name: dimensions
plainFields.description: Package dimensions for shipping.

plainFields.name: special_instructions
plainFields.description: Special delivery instructions from customer.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Shipping record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Shipping record last modification timestamp.

models.name: shopping_platform_trackings
models.description: Detailed tracking events and status updates for shipments. Provides granular delivery progress information enabling customers and sellers to monitor package movement through the delivery network.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Tracking status event (picked up, in transit, delivered).

plainFields.name: location
plainFields.description: Current or event location description.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Detailed status description from carrier.

plainFields.name: timestamp
plainFields.description: Event occurrence timestamp.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Tracking event creation timestamp.

models.name: shopping_platform_reviews
models.description: Customer product reviews including star ratings and text comments for verified purchases. Links to buyers ({@link shopping_platform_buyers.id}) and order items to ensure authenticity and prevent duplicate reviews. Supports moderation features for inappropriate content.

foreignFields.name: shopping_platform_buyer_id
foreignFields.description: Buyer who submitted this review ({@link shopping_platform_buyers.id}).

foreignFields.name: shopping_platform_order_item_id
foreignFields.description: Order item being reviewed ({@link shopping_platform_order_items.id}). Ensures only purchased products can be reviewed.

plainFields.name: title
plainFields.description: Review title summarizing the experience.

plainFields.name: rating
plainFields.description: Star rating from 1 to 5.

plainFields.name: comment
plainFields.description: Detail review text explaining the rating.

plainFields.name: is_verified
plainFields.description: Whether this review is from a verified purchase.

plainFields.name: helpful_count
plainFields.description: Number of users who found this review helpful.

plainFields.name: moderation_status
plainFields.description: Moderation status: pending, approved, rejected, or hidden.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Review creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp for review removal.

models.name: shopping_platform_review_images
models.description: Images uploaded with product reviews for visual feedback. Directly associated with reviews ({@link shopping_platform_reviews.id}) to support rich review content. Supports multiple images per review.

foreignFields.name: shopping_platform_review_id
foreignFields.description: Review this image belongs to ({@link shopping_platform_reviews.id}).

plainFields.name: image_url
plainFields.description: URL to the uploaded review image.

plainFields.name: alt_text
plainFields.description: Alternative text describing the image for accessibility.

plainFields.name: sequence_order
plainFields.description: Display order of images in the review.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Image upload timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp for image removal.

models.name: shopping_platform_seller_dashboards
models.description: Seller performance analytics dashboard providing key metrics for individual sellers including sales volume, revenue, customer ratings, and inventory status. This table aggregates performance data to support seller business operations and help them optimize their marketplace presence. Referenced by shopping_platform_sellers.id for seller-specific dashboards.

plainFields.name: total_sales_volume
plainFields.description: Total number of units sold by this seller.

plainFields.name: total_revenue
plainFields.description: Total revenue generated in USD.

plainFields.name: average_rating
plainFields.description: Average star rating from customer reviews.

plainFields.name: active_listings_count
plainFields.description: Number of currently active product listings.

plainFields.name: inventory_alerts_count
plainFields.description: Number of items with low inventory requiring attention.

plainFields.name: top_product_name
plainFields.description: Name of the best-performing product.

plainFields.name: last_updated_at
plainFields.description: When the dashboard metrics were last recalculated.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp.

models.name: shopping_platform_admin_logins
models.description: Tracking of administrative login attempts for security monitoring and compliance requirements. Records login events, IP addresses, and success status to detect suspicious activities and maintain audit trails. Referenced by shopping_platform_admins.id for admin-specific login history.

plainFields.name: login_timestamp
plainFields.description: When the login attempt occurred.

plainFields.name: ip_address
plainFields.description: IP address from which the login attempt was made.

plainFields.name: user_agent
plainFields.description: Browser/user agent string for device identification.

plainFields.name: successful_login
plainFields.description: Whether the login attempt was successful.

plainFields.name: failure_reason
plainFields.description: Reason for failure if unsuccessful (e.g., invalid credentials, account locked).

plainFields.name: session_duration
plainFields.description: Duration of the session in minutes if login was successful.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp.

models.name: shopping_platform_audit_logs
models.description: Comprehensive audit trail for all platform administrative actions and critical business events. Records changes, deletions, and significant system events for compliance, troubleshooting, and security monitoring. Referenced by shopping_platform_admins.id for admin actions traced to responsible administrators.

plainFields.name: affected_entity_id
plainFields.description: ID of the entity that was modified (could be sale, seller, admin, user, product, etc.). Generic UUID without specific table reference to support auditing any platform entity.

plainFields.name: action_timestamp
plainFields.description: When the audited action occurred.

plainFields.name: action_type
plainFields.description: Type of action performed (CREATE, UPDATE, DELETE, LOGIN, etc.).

plainFields.name: entity_type
plainFields.description: Type of entity affected (sale, seller, admin, buyer, product, etc.).

plainFields.name: old_value
plainFields.description: Previous state of changed field in JSON format.

plainFields.name: new_value
plainFields.description: New state of changed field in JSON format.

plainFields.name: ip_address
plainFields.description: IP address from which the action originated.

plainFields.name: user_agent
plainFields.description: Browser/user agent string at the time of action.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Human-readable description of the action performed.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp.
